meanings.definition: A very small distance or amount
meanings.sent1: She missed the target by a hairsbreadth.
meanings.sent2: The cat squeezed through the opening with only a hairsbreadth to spare.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a hairsbreadth too much salt to the soup.
meanings.sent4: The detective was a hairsbreadth away from solving the case.
meanings.sent5: The mountain climber felt the hairsbreadth difference between success and failure.

meanings.sent1: The team won the game by a hairsbreadth.
meanings.sent2: The decision was made with only a hairsbreadth of difference between the options.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick relied on a hairsbreadth of timing.
meanings.sent4: The negotiation was at a hairsbreadth of reaching an agreement.
meanings.sent5: The friendship was on a hairsbreadth of falling apart before they reconciled.
